Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: Travel G
Reviews.Content: booked economy double nights thirty euro night tourist 10 minute walk metro 20m front door absolutely spotless bright modern worried economy double roomy dont mind street noise try looking street charged credit card nights arrived ample notice cancellations book negative watersaving spring taps bathroom extremely annoying bathrooms themselves spotless quiet clean stay excellent value

Reviews.Title: “Great place, great location”
Reviews.Author: Bridget A
Reviews.Content: stayed september definitely recommend friends cute lots character balcony overlooking central courtyard sit enjoy glass wine hours foot bathroom clean pleasantly suprised discover welloutfitted kitchen quiet comparison stayed various cities hotel alway quiet barri gotic la rambla 15 minute walk metro station urgell 100 meters front door staff manning office 9pm dont key front door try checkin late otherwise fantastic value
